title: Pro Vaccine Campaign Exposed!
cleaned_text: It turns out that Jennifer Hibben-White who posted a viral facebook post worried that her new born baby may have contracted the measles due to the “anti- vaxxers” has large ties to big pharma. In this video Dan Dicks of Press For Truth exposes the links that prove that this was nothing more than a marketing campaigned designed to counter the work of the so called “anti-vaxxers”.Sources:https://www.facebook.com/jennifer.hibbenwhitehttp://www.ctvnews.ca/health/canadian-mother-s-powerful-post-on-measles-i-blame-you-1.2230818https://www.facebook.com/alan.hibben/friendshttps://www.facebook.com/thibben1/about?section=relationshiphttps://ca.linkedin.com/in/alanhibbenhttp://www.havergal.on.ca/uploaded/Torch/HavergalTORCH_Fall2010_Annual_Report_WEB_Final.pdfhttp://www.marketvisual.com/Profile/MapFull?eid=cf6499ed-d877-4bf0-a30c-1f8505ae4274http://www.nasdaq.com/markets/ipos/filing.ashx?filingid=3032519http://www.macraesbluebook.com/search/company.cfm?company=751178http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-2956408/Mom-told-15-day-old-son-exposed-measles-hospital-humbled-THOUSANDS-people-say-Facebook-post-lashing-anti-vaxxers-inspired-immunize-children.htmlBecome a PFT Patron at http://www.patreon.com/PressForTruthShout out goes to one of my first PFT Patrons Martin Hill!Follow Dan Dicks:on Facebook ➜ http://www.facebook.com/PressForTruthon Instagram ➜ http://instagram.com/dandickspfton Twitter ➜ http://twitter.com/#!/DanDicksPFT➜ https://twitter.com/PressForTruthSubscribe:Youtube ➜ http://www.youtube.com/weavingspiderPress For Truth TV ➜ http://www.patreon.com/PressForTruthSupport Press For Truth:Patreon ➜ http://www.patreon.com/PressForTruthDonate ➜ https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=JVRY7655FFBHGGet PFT Gear ➜ http://www.pressfortruth.ca/category/pft-shop/Visit http://pressfortruth.ca/
